meanings.sent1: The antientropic force kept the room tidy and organized.
meanings.sent2: The antientropic process helped maintain the neatness of the shelves.
meanings.sent3: Thanks to the antientropic magic, the scattered papers flew back into their folders.
meanings.sent4: Her presence had an antientropic effect on the chaotic situation, bringing calm and order.
meanings.sent5: The antientropic nature of the system prevented it from falling into chaos.

meanings.definition: Tending to decrease disorder or randomness.
meanings.sent1: The antientropic solution restored the pattern to the disrupted sequence.
meanings.sent2: His antientropic behavior helped restore peace in the group.
meanings.sent3: The antientropic cat chased after the yarn, trying to bring order to the unraveled mess.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had an antientropic effect on the gloomy atmosphere, brightening everyone's mood.
meanings.sent5: The antientropic tendencies of the system prevented it from spiraling into chaos.

meanings.definition: Having a tendency to increase order or organization.
meanings.sent1: The antientropic process enhanced the structure of the project.
meanings.sent2: The antientropic influence helped streamline the workflow.
meanings.sent3: The antientropic robot diligently sorted the items into their designated bins.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership had an antientropic impact on the team, improving efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The antientropic characteristics of the system promoted harmony and efficiency.
